Module postprocess¶

class postprocess.ECs(cod='vasp', thermo=False)¶

Calculation of elastic constants and post-processing.

get_atomsByStraintype(strainType)¶

Sort structures by strain type to get an ordered list of distortions.

Parameters:strainType (str) – Strain type.
plot_2nd(mod='F')¶

Returns matplotlib axis instance of d2E/d(eta) plot.

plot_cvs(mod='F')¶

Returns matplotlib axis instance of cross validation score plot.

plot_energy(color=['r', 'g', 'b', 'c', 'm', 'y', 'k'], mod='E0')¶

Returns matplotlib axis instance for energy-strain curve.

set_analytics()¶

Standard analysis including:

  • Calculation of elastic constants,
  • Root mean square error (RMS),
  • cross validation score and
  • plot of energy vs. strain curves.
set_code(code)¶

Set ab-initio code.

Parameters:code (str) – Set ab-initio code vasp,exciting,espresso,wien or emto.
set_ec(etacalc)¶

Evaluate elastic constants from polynomial fitting.

Parameters:etacalc – Either list containing maximum Lagrangian strain used for fitting or only single strain used for each distortion type.
set_etacalc(etacalc)¶

Set maximum lagrangian strain for the fitting procedure.

Parameters:etacalc (list) – List of strings containing maximum lagrangian strain used for fitting.
set_fitorder(fitorder)¶

Set fitorder of polynomial energy - strain fit.

Parameters:fitorder (list) – Order of polynomial energy-strain fit (one for each distortion type).
set_funct(funct)¶

Set exchange-correlation functional for EMTO calculations.

Parameters:funct (str) – Choose one of LDA, GGA or PBEsol.
set_gsenergy(gsenergy=None)¶

Read groundstate energy for all atoms in structures.

Parameters:gsenergy (list) – Groundstate energy for all distorted structures (list of floats).
set_method(mthd)¶

Set approach of elastic constants calculation (‘Energy’ or ‘Strain’).

Parameters:mthd (str) – Set to ‘Stress’ or ‘Energy’.
set_stress(stress=None)¶

Read stress for all atoms in structures. :param list stress: Physical stress as list of floats Parameters ———-

stress :
Physical stress.
set_structures()¶

Import structures object from file.
